return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{headerData:headerData}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Herov2,{isBg:"yes",heroData:heroData,secondsTimer:secondsTimer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AnnouncementBar,{heroData:heroData,secondsTimer:secondsTimer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Characters,{charactersDataa:charactersData}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BookAbout,{isBg:"",overviewData:overviewData,heroData:heroData,secondsTimer:secondsTimer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Authorv3,{isBg:"",authorData:authorData,heroData:heroData,secondsTimer:secondsTimer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RefundBanner,{refundData:refundData,heroData:heroData,secondsTimer:secondsTimer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Testimonial,{isBg:"yes",reviewData:reviewData}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Authorv5,{isBg:"",fomoAuthorData:fomoAuthorData,heroData:heroData,secondsTimer:secondsTimer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UltimateHero,{isBg:"yes",ultimateData:ultimateData,heroData:heroData,secondsTimer:secondsTimer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CusFooter,{policyData:policyData,userAgreementData:userAgreementData,footerData:footerData})]});};export default Version02;
